thread.title: 9 Places to Visit Before They Change Forever (Infographic)
thread.title_full: 9 Places to Visit Before They Change Forever (Infographic)

author: Orbitz.com
title: 9 Places to Visit Before They Change Forever (Infographic)
text:
reddit 
By the Orbitz Travel Blog Editors for the Orbitz Travel Blog 
"You can never visit the same place twice. Each time, it's a different story." At least that's what author Maureen Johnson wrote in her novel The Last Little Blue Envelope . That sentiment feels especially true with these nine destinations around the world, where environmental changes, development, tourism and politics could change them in a flash. For your next trip, here are nine places to visit before they're gone, or change forever. 
Click and then click again to enlarge.
